text:
[Verse]
Woke up to the sunlight
Shining on my face
Stepped out in the bright light
World is such a place

[Verse 2]
Birds are singing loudly
Echoes in the sky
Feeling kinda rowdy
As the time goes by

[Chorus]
Walking in the sunshine
No need to hurry
Walking in the sunshine
Free of any worry

[Verse 3]
Children laughing playing
Joy is in the air
You could call it praying
Happiness everywhere

[Verse 4]
Flowers in the meadow
Colors so alive
Life is just this simple
In moments we thrive

[Chorus]
Walking in the sunshine
No need to hurry
Walking in the sunshine
Free of any worry
title: Walking in the Sunshine
